nodes.text: The Imperial Medal of Resolution was an Imperial badge awarded to individuals who managed to "uphold law at the Battle of Restuss." It was slightly lower in rank than the Imperial Grand Medal of Resolution, awarded to individuals who directly drove out Rebel Alliance members during the battle.

The Imperial Medal of Resolution appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Because of the player-optional nature of the Battle of Restuss, it is unknown whether the medal was ever canonically issued.
